summary: A suicidal girl started to visit a convicted murderer awaiting execution every Thursday.
cast: Lee Nayoung|Dong-won Gang|Yuh-jung Youn|Kang Shin-il|Hyun-Sung Jang|In-gi Jeong|Yeong-suk Jeong|Oh Jeong-Se|Bu-seon Kim|Ja-yeong Kim|Jee-Young Kim|Jin-hyeok Kim|Se-dong Kim|Oh Kwang-rok|Byung-Joon Lee|Jae-goo Lee|Ik-joon Yang
title: Urideul-ui haengbok-han shigan
